item.title: Creating a static blog, the convoluted way
item.description: TLDR: I wanted to create a static blog while being able to type articles from a nice UI, from anywhere. It is quite straightforward with forestry + hugo + github pages. Jump to the solution. Motivation If you’re looking to create a blog, you’re in luck! There are countless tools to help you get up and running in a few minutes. For example Hugo will generate a static site from a few markdown files, and pushing it to github in a repository named YOUR_USERNAME.

item.title: About me
item.description: About me Hi there, I’m Paul Willot. I grew up in France and moved to Japan for my first job. I started as a programmer, mainly for tasks centered on machine learning, and recently moved into project and team leadership. I enjoy talking about machine learning, programming, sysadmin and life in Japan. Though I can’t promise an immediate reply, feel free to email me. I’m happy to talk to you!
